resources.string: Desenvolver habilidades e ampliar competências. Esse é o principal objetivo dos cursos de Pós-Graduação da FAI, que têm como foco principal a realidade do mercado e a transformação do conhecimento em resultados práticos para as organizações e instituições onde os alunos atuam ou irão atuar. \nReconhecida como um centro de excelência nas áreas de gestão, tecnologia e educação, a FAI, consolida essa marca de qualidade com cursos de pós-graduação inovadores e voltados para profissionais que, realmente buscam um diferencial.
Versão 1.0 (07032015) \n\u00A9 FAI - Centro de Ensino Superior em Gestão, Tecnologia e Educação.

string-array.name: professors_description
string-array.item: Salman Khan, founder, Khan Academy::: Khan Academy aims to provide nothing less than a free, top-notch education to anyone, anywhere.::: salman_khan
Ben Rattray::: Ben Rattray, 31, started petition platform Change.org in 2005 to provide a better way for people to tell their stories and promote their causes.::: ben_rattray
Hans Rosling, co-founder, Gapminder Foundation::: Rosling, 63, is passionate about advancing the public\'s understanding of data and science.::: hans_rosling
Pete Cashmore, founder, Mashable::: Pete Cashmore, 26, started Mashable from his bedroom in Scotland when he was 19.::: peter_cashmore
Marc Andreessen, VC::: Marc Andreeseen, 40, co-wrote the first popular web browser and co-founded Netscape (acquired by AOL in 1998 for $4.2 billion).::: marc_andreessen
Sheryl Sandberg, COO, Facebook::: The list of organisations on 42-year-old Harvard grad Sheryl Sandberg\'s resume is impressive.::: sheryl_sandberg
Tim Cook, CEO, Apple::: Apple\'s 51-year-old former chief operating officer faces the daunting task of picking up where legendary Apple founder Steve Jobs left off.::: tim_cook
Daniel Ek, CEO, Spotify::: Swedish serial entrepreneur Daniel Ek, 29, runs Spotify, the company tipped to save the recording industry from the twin threats of piracy and iTunes.::: daniel_ek
Virginia Rometty, CEO, IBM::: Ginni Rometty, 54, made history last October as the first woman to lead IT behemoth IBM.::: virginia_rometty
Erik Martin, general manager, Reddit::: Erik Martin 33, San Francisco Bay Area resident is the guiding force behind viral news board Reddit.::: erik_martin
